title: Anneliese Dodds – 2021 Speech on Reversing Decline of the High Streets
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Anneliese Dodds, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, in Birmingham on 22 March 2021.

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
